meta.title: Iron Alchemy
meta.description: Elevate your lifting journey with Iron Alchemy! Access comprehensive training logs, advanced tools like the One Rep Max Calculator, expert programming insights, and a trainer dashboard. Optimize your training and track progress with precision. Sign up now!

HeroSection.title: Craft Your Perfect Training Formula
HeroSection.description: Comprehensive Training Logs, Advanced Tools, Expert Insights

features.title: Training Tips
features.description: Dive into articles on training and programming. Learn how to perform manual muscle tests, understand muscle synergies and antagonists, and more.

features.title: Tools for Powerlifters
features.description: Utilize tools like One Rep Max Calculator, DOTS Calculator, Load Drop Calculator, and more to optimize your training.

features.title: Training Dashboard
features.description: Record your workouts and track progress through microcycles, mesocycles, and macrocycles with advanced metrics and indicators.

features.title: Trainer's Corner
features.description: Create, edit, and assign training plans. Monitor athletes' progress with dashboards and get alerts when intervention is needed.

ComingSoon.title: Coming soon
ComingSoon.description: We're crafting something special for you
